diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $x$ units.
The measure of angle $ACD$ is $43$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The line connecting $C$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
The line connecting $A$ and $B$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
